definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Julie bought milk and three packets of soup mix.
sentences.chinese: 茱莉买了牛奶和三包调理汤包。

sentences.english: Pork irrigation soup packets , Carrots eggs bag, millet congee.
sentences.chinese: 猪肉灌汤包，胡萝卜鸡蛋包，小米粥。

sentences.english: Shanghai is best known for its street food, especially soup dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 上海的美食以街边小吃而闻名，特别是灌汤包。

sentences.english: 9 a.m. - Breakfast calls for some of Shanghai's best dumplings at hole-in-the-wall Jia Jia Tang Bao, located near bustling People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 到人民广场附近的小店佳家汤包吃早餐。

sentences.english: Soup steamed buns without ginger inside.
This restaurant has the best soup buns, for only 2$ per bamboo steamer.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅的汤包最好吃，一笼2美元。

definition: shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
shengjian, a pan-fried bun filled with meat and juices, a Shanghai specialty
wonton/see also 餛飩|馄饨[hun2 tun5]
